name: Fix crashes after pressing play on some systems
body:
- Fix crash after pressing play on some systems
  (thanks to jorfus for the support to find the issue)
- Fix playing first note twice after pressing play on some systems
  (thanks to jorfus for the support to find the issue)
- Modified mute icon
- Updated to latest dependencies

name: Don't restart player if reported device does not change
Write audio device info after pressing play to logs
Write audio device info to logs
Fix bug that sometimes audio was started multiple times
Instrumented version with audio routing logs
Instrumented version with even more logs
body: Write logs on audiorouting changes

name: Instrumented version with more logs
body: Instrument PlayerService with several logs.

name: Instrumented version with logs
body: Write several log messages.

name: Reduced press-play-to-start-playing latency, fixes
body:
- Reduce latency between pressing play and playing the first note
- Faster scene switch while playing
- Refactored tap-in logic
- Fix for correct overwriting of scenes files
- Allow reading incomplete scenes files

name: Latency improvements and tap-in refactor
body:
Reduce time span between pressing play and playing the first note
After changing scenes while playing, the new scene starts playing immediately
Refactors tap-in logic (maybe it's better ...)

name: Preload samples for quicker player start - rc2
body:
- Preloading samples for quicker player start
- Update libraries
- Refactor deprecated functions

name: Preload samples for quicker player start
Fix for loading scenes files.
body: Loading scene files from within the app sometimes failed. By switching to launch mode "singleTask", this should now be fixed.

name: Share only selected scenes
body:
- When sharing scenes you can now unselect the scenes  you don't want to share
- Restructuring of files into folders
- All AlertDialogs are using now DialogFragments, which means that they persist when screen is rotated

name: Share only selected scenes
body: Add an option to share only selected scenes.

name: Chinese translations
body:
- Add translation for Simplified Chinese (thanks to "HZ is not Chatty")
- Minor updates and cleanups

name: Fixes
body: - Fix issue that active editing note was sometime not shown

name: Minor scene layout improvements
body:
- Slightly increase scenes in compact view of scenes
- Slightly increase player controls in scenes view
- Update French translations (thanks to brilnius)

name: Compact scenes layout, fixes
body:
- Show scene number in front of scene title
- Hide control buttons to go to previous/next scene if there is not such as scene
- Add option for compact scenes layout
- Fix crash when deleting a scene
- Fix: volume-slider button did not always reappear

name: Compact scenes layout
body: Add option for compact scenes layout

name: scene numbers
body:
- Show scene number in front of scene title
- Hide control buttons to go to previous/next scene if there is not such as scene
- Fix crash when deleting a scene
- Fix: volume-slider button did not always reappear

name: Better player controls in scenes view
body:
- Player controls in scenes view
- Fix issue that after edit of a scene the notelist was not always updated
- Fix issue, that when editing a note, sometimes the position jumps arbitrarily
- Fix issue, when loading scene list

name: Player controls in scenes fragment
body: Add player controls to scenes fragment.

name: Bring app to background with back-button
body:
- Bring app to background with back-button
- Update French translations (thanks to brilnius)
- Update dependencies
- Refactor deprecated functions

name: Update dependencies
body:
- Update dependencies
- Increase opacity in bounce tick visualization a bit

name: Plurals
body:
Use Java 11 in gradle
Use plurals

name: Test for ui fix on some phones
Animation and tick visualization fixes
body:
- Fix: That tick visualization did sometimes not stop.
- Fix: Stop showing active scene title when when it is deleted.
- Fix: Animation issues.

name: Note durations, mute, tick visualization
body:
- Notes with different speeds
- UI improvements
- Mute Button
- More accurate tick visualization (still to be tested)
- Choose between different tick visualizations

name: Note durationes
body:
- Choose different note durations
- Choose different beat durations

name: Finnish translations
body:
- Add Finnish translations (thanks to retki)
- Color of statusbar is now always black

name: Share saved scenes, Polish translations
body:
- Scene sharing
- Polish translations (thanks to econo202)

name: code refactoring, better scenes management
body:
- Code refactoring using ViewModels
- Better management of scenes

name: Vibration called from AudioMixer thread
body: this tries to improve the situation of delayed vibration

name: Vibration delay
body: Add option for vibration delay.

name: Selectable speed text
body: Make speed text selectable to allow typing a new speed.

name: Thread-based player, delete-all button, translations
body:
- Playing is done in a separate thread
- Show numbers below notes
- Additionally highlight notes with outline when selected
- Add button to reset notes
- Fix minor visual issue volume sliders
- Add Basque translation (thanks to Porrumentzio)

name: player in thread, delete-all-button
body: improvements like playing sound now in own thread and a new "delete-all-notes" button

name: Vibrations and Italian translations
body:
- Allow pause/play via notification when screen is locked
- Fix: Saving current setup did not always save
- Add option for vibrating notes
- Italian translations

name: Option for changing vibration strength
body: Add option for changing vibration strength.

name: Vibrating notes
body:
- Allow pause/play via notification when screen is locked
- Fix: Saving current setup did not always save
- Add option for vibrating notes

name: First official release of version 2
body:
- Animated notes
- Improved choosing of sounds
- More consistent color scheme
- Import/export saved note lists

name: Fix Bluetooth playback
body: This should fix Bluetooth playback on some devices.

name: Recreate AudioTrack when pressing play
body: This is a test trying to make the app work with Bluetooth on more systems.

name: French translations
body: French translations.

name: Recreate AudioTrack when pressing play and reinizalize everything
body: Second Bluetooth test, where the audio track is completely reinitialized when we start playing.

name: Sounds are stored as wav instead of flac
body: Some devices show problems when decoding flac files. Thus, a simple wav-reader is introduced.

name: Mute tracks are stereo
body: This might fix startup issues on some phones. To be tested.

name: New speed visualization, Spanish translations, fixes
body:
- Spanish translation is now available (thanks to Diego Sangunietti)
- New speed visualization, which should feel more natural
- Fix: Speed did not update to latest value (so the playing speed was about 1bpm off)

name: Fixes in audio decoding
body: Fixes in audio decoding.

name: Startup fix for some phones
body: Fix bug when decoders give too short track duration.

name: tap-in fix
body:
- bug fix for tap-in before pressing play
- some conversions to kotlin

name: New player logic
body: Replacing the old player logic with an audio mixer should make the metronome much more accurate.

name: Fix timing issue for first beat after pressing play
body: First beat after pressing play was sometimes played too late. This should hopefully improve the situation.

name: Option for keeping screen on and maybe timing improvements
body: Getting good timing seems not easy in android, hopefully this brings some improvements.

name: Improved layouting
body:
- Improved layout, such that it also works on tablets
- Support Android 10
- Small fixes

name: Minor fix
body:
Fix: Choice buttons did not always disappear
Change notification layout

name: Update screenshots
body: Update screenshots and feature graphic.

name: Improved choosing of sounds and volume
body:
- Add +- one step choices to speed panel
- Increment/decrement speed in notification
- Reorder sounds so that the notes go from lowest to highest
- Add kick drum sound
- notification shows now buttons for + and - instead of just text
- Modified app icon
- Add 48kHz sounds, such that fast track mixer can be used on 48kHz devices
- Improved TapIn-algorithm
- Add volume sliders for setting volume of different sounds
- Add German locals
- Add new way to choose sounds

name: Linear speed indicator
body:
- Linear speed indicator instead of rotation points.
- Use theme colors for volume indicator

name: Small improvements in notification
body:
- Nicer notification
- Show message in save-data-window, if there are not items saved

name: New settings and speed increment different from 1
body: - Add settings for speed increment and speed changing sensitivity

name: Initial release
body: Initial release with basic functionality
